channel.title: Vote4cash error Please Help
channel.description:
I used the guide RuneTopListV2 http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/406707-new-runetoplist-voting-script-v2-vote4items.html
The error I get is when i run the server... it doesnt seem to connect to mysql. I have the correct information to connect to it and I have all the privileges set.
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.gjt.mm.mysql.Driver at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java: 366) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java: 355) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.j ava:354) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:4 23) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launche r.java:308) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:3 56) at java.lang.Class.forName0(Native Method) at java.lang.Class.forName(Class.java:186) at org.runetoplist.MySQL.<init>(MySQL.java:34) at org.runetoplist.VoteChecker.<init>(VoteChecker.jav a:20) at net.com.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:46) [Game Engine] - Starting server on port: 43594
Thanks for the help.

item.title: Vote4cash error Please Help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

You’re going to want to edit the file, and add this in:
deps/mysql.jar;
Here is my run.bat if you want to use it (for example, i doubt it’ll work for your server but it may):

@echo off TITLE Server Online! java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause

Note: deps is a folder, and the .jar is named mysql.jar

Read full topic

item.title: Vote4cash error Please Help
item.dc:creator: @fuzzball109 fuzzball109
item.description:
@fuzzball109 wrote:

I have the drivers, but how would i get it to use these jars? Thanks so much for the help

Read full topic

item.title: Vote4cash error Please Help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:3, topic:533319”]This specific error is because you’re missing the mysql connector jar
You can download it Here (for a .kar) or Here (for a .zip) on the page that comes up just hit the “No thanks, just start my download” link. Extract the .jar and place it in your server’s libs/deps folder. (You may need to change the name)[/quote]
If you didn’t read the quote…

You’re missing the MySQL drivers for your server (or they’re outdated), or your server cannot find the path to them (that’d be a run issue, and why you use IDE’s.)

Read full topic
